summary: Implemented a new /admin-help route and added admin-principal configuration guidance, plus updates toward showing principal info in the admin access gate. Admin /users route remains gated and backend admin-only listing is enforced. However, due to truncation, some REQ-47 acceptance criteria cannot be confirmed from the provided diff summary. Several unrelated UI/branding/content changes appear to have been made that are outside the BuildRequest.

missing_requirements.requirement: When an authenticated but non-admin user is denied admin access, the Access Denied view must display the currently authenticated Internet Identity Principal as text and include clear English instructions telling the owner where the admin Principal is configured and that it must match the shown Principal.
missing_requirements.reason: AdminAccessGate.tsx is truncated before the Access Denied Card content. While the code computes `currentPrincipal` and includes copy/help handlers, the diff excerpt does not show the principal being rendered as text nor the required configuration instructions being displayed.

hallucinated_features.description: Branding/title changes (e.g., document title updated from "Portalfxsign" to "TelsFX").
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-46/47/48 and outside the BuildRequest scope.

hallucinated_features.description: Landing page changes adding a dynamic user-count KPI component (UsersWorldwideKpi).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-46/47/48 and outside the BuildRequest scope.

hallucinated_features.description: Products page content changes including removal of all disclaimer text.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-46/47/48 and outside the BuildRequest scope.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer content changes (Elon Musk recognition, Tesla-associated company names, and navigation behavior updates).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-46/47/48 and outside the BuildRequest scope.
